system.description:
While wearing this charm you gain an expertise die on checks and saving throws to avoid falling prone, or you can break the charm to release its power, destroying it to activate one of the following effects.

  • Abase: As an action, choose a creature you can see within 200 feet. It makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw or its flying speed (if any) is reduced to 0 feet for 1 minute, or until you lose concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). An affected airborne creature falls, taking damage when it lands (maximum 8d6 bludgeoning damage).

  • Reshape: Cast stone shape.

  • Withdraw: Cast meld into stone.

Curse. Releasing the charmâ€™s power attracts the attention of a divi who seeks you out to demand your service.
